VEGAN PEANUT BUTTER & JELLY PROTEIN BARS

A nostalgic and delicious vegan protein bar with a classic peanut butter and jelly flavor, containing 17g of protein.

17g
Protein
260
Calories
15m
Total Time
12
Yield

Nutrition per 1 bar

Carbs25g
Fat14g
Fiber5g
Sugar12g
DifficultyEasy

INGREDIENTS

  • 240g creamy peanut butter
  • 120g vanilla plant-based protein powder
  • 90g rolled oats
  • 60g maple syrup
  • 80g sugar-free raspberry jam

INSTRUCTIONS

1

Make the peanut butter layer

In a bowl, combine the peanut butter, protein powder, rolled oats, and maple syrup. Mix until a dough forms.

2

Press into pan

Press two-thirds of the dough into a lined 8x8 inch pan.

3

Add the jelly layer

Spread the raspberry jam evenly over the peanut butter layer.

4

Add the topping

Crumble the remaining dough over the jam layer.

5

Chill

Refrigerate for at least 30 minutes.

6

Cut and enjoy

Cut into 12 bars and enjoy the classic PB&J flavor.

PRO TIPS

üí°

Store in an airtight container at room temperature for up to 5 days.

üí°

For best results, use a kitchen scale to measure ingredients in grams.

üí°

Let cool completely before storing to prevent sogginess.
